# W4948-24SE11 Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR) Support

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**

**Issued by: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**

**Notice Reference Number: WS4001307102**

**Publication Date: 2023-05-09**

**Tender Closing Date and Time: 2023-05-24T14:00:00 EDT**

**Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-02**

**Expected Contract End Date: None**

This Request for Proposal is issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the provision of Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR) Support services. The services will include specialized communications and sensor equipment to provide ISR capabilities in support of mission commander on-the-job training and currency for HSI sensor operators.

**Contract Description:**
The ISR Support services will be provided by a charter aircraft, which will be equipped with the necessary communications and sensor equipment to support mission commander training and currency. The charter aircraft will be operated by a qualified pilot and will be available for use by the DND.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Only Supply Arrangement holders who have been invited to submit a proposal will be considered. Other interested bidders may submit a proposal to qualify for the Supply Arrangement and access future RFPs.

**Requirements:**

* The charter aircraft must be equipped with specialized communications and sensor equipment to provide ISR capabilities.
* The charter aircraft must be operated by a qualified pilot.
* The charter aircraft must be available for use by the DND.

**Submission Requirements:**
Proposals must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery or Buyandsell.gc.ca by the closing date and time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Additional Information:**
For further information, please contact Shamael Malko-Moore at (613) 998-7766 or shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  # procurementMethods # governmentTenders # CanadianBusiness
